{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Motorola |model=MR1700 |revision=v1 |series=AC1700 |fcc_date=11/15/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SGE (T&W) |manuf_model=AP-MTKH7 |manuf_rev=-0003 |type=wireless router |fcc_id=2AF5PMR1700 |pcb_id=AP-MTKH7-0003 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT;MEDIATEK, MT7621AT, 1708-AMTH, CTPCCV56, DTPCAC78; |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FVFG |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC64M16GP-DI |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7615N;MEDIATEK, ARM, MT7615N, 1651-BFSL, ACMSYCFR; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612E;MEDIATEK, MT7612EN, 1652-BMAL, ETPBYF492; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=MOTOXXXX, |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=motorola }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''800''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1700 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1700 WiFi Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://motorolanetwork.com/mr1700.html}} "AP-MTKH7-0003 REV1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{See also|SGE AP-MTKH7|SGE|T&W}} This may suggest that the device is designed by [[SGE]] ([[T&W]]), see also: *[[D-Link DIR-882 rev A1]] *[[D-Link DIR-878 rev A1]] *[[D-Link DIR-867 rev A1]] The ''Letter of declaration model difference'' at the FCC suggests that various other model numbers :similar to MR1700XX may be used to differentiate products for marketing purposes. ===See also=== *[[Motorola MX1200]] *[[Motorola MR1700]] • AP-MTKH7-0003 *[[Motorola MR1900]] *[[Motorola MR2600]] • AP-MTKH7-0002 __NOTOC__
